ApplicationFormEvaluation.name: ApplicationFormEvaluation
ApplicationFormEvaluation.description: Represents the details of the evaluation performed for an application form. For example, the details of the evaluation of a loan application form by an underwriter.

ApplicationFormId.description: The application form that was evaluated.

ApplicationFormProductId.description: The product in the application form that's being evaluated.

Comments.description: The evaluator's comments to the evaluation.

Date.description: The date when the evaluation was performed.

Decision.description: Specifices the decision of the evaluation.

EvaluatorId.description: The User or Group who evaluated the application form.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the application form evaluation record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.
